short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your infinite list of tabs easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For those who like to keep thousands of tabs opened while you surf the web, manage and organize using this extension. If you think its like the pin native feature that's true, but it's easier and works better with more default and incognito tabs.
